response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering its immense worth, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you with a special offer of $20,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential value it could bring to you. I trust that you will appreciate its true worth and consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 20000}
